title: WTB: Louisville Players, T206 and Colgan's Chips
author: chris

posts.post_title: WTB: Louisville Players, T206 and Colgan's Chips
posts.post_content:
Hello - I am looking to buy any Louisville Players from either T206 (Puttman, Thielman and Delehanty) or Colgan's Chip issue. Please email me at [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url]. 

Thanks
Chris :)

Thanks Erick for the Delehanty. I am still buying Louisville players from all issues, preferably tough T206 backs and Colgan Chips. 

Please email me at [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url] with any for sale.   

Thanks :)
No problem Chris.  Always love helping out with collections.
